name: Loreena McKennitt
description: '''Loreena McKennitt''' {{post-nominals|country=CAN|CM|OM|CD}} (born February 17, 1957) is a Canadian singer-songwriter, multi-instrumentalist, and composer who writes, records, and performs [[world music]] with [[Celtic music|Celtic]] and [[Middle Eastern music|Middle Eastern]] influences. McKennitt is known for her refined and clear soprano vocals. She has sold more than 16 million records worldwide.
